oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Mission of Mercy"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: medicine; nursing; Visiting Nurse Association; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Mrs. Susie Malone of the Visiting Nurse Association of Memphis demonstrates the type of service provided by her agency for patients convalescing at home. The child is Helen Cross, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Remus Cross of 248 East Exchange. Visiting nurses dress wounds, give hypodermics and baths, teach young mothers about infant care, help chart nutritious meals and provide professional nursing service."
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Memphis - Nurses and nursing - Visiting nurse association
